name: Share Better Screenshots
description:
Share better looking screenshots with as much or as little detail as possible.


Add headline text, sticky notes, comment bubbles, watermarks, emojis, FigJam elements, browser wrappers, macOS docks, blur effects, magnifiers, image backgrounds and more! Auto-layout neatly packs everything together and if you ever want to go rogue—there’s absolute positioning just for that.


Step-up your screenshot sharing game today!


-

Jello (@madewithjello)
